article_title: Psychiatrist Shortage Worsens Amid 'Mental Health Crisis'

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The demand for psychiatrists is becoming a more pressing issue for state and federal lawmakers and has contributed to an expansion of insurance coverage of telehealth to increase access to mental health services in shortage areas. Companies who recruit doctors for health facilities say psychiatrists are almost as desired as primary [...]
